title: Sup Main Need Good Gold or Plat ADC
body:
LFP - im Gold III, Main Nami, Braum, Thresh, Janna, Leona, Bard and Blitz (Can play others but these are my best) 

Goal is to stay gold put id prefer if i was Plat Message me if interested or if there more people who wanna join we can premake

replies.body: adc main here (jhin and cait) hit me up with an invite
